title: Basic Rules for Dungeons and Dragons (D&D) Fifth Edition (5e) - D&D Beyond
snippet: This section contains the Dungeons & Dragons Basic Rules and the rules in the SRD, released as part of the Open Gaming License.

title: Sage Advice Compendium - Sage Advice & Errata - D&D Beyond
snippet: The fifth edition of D&D has three core rulebooks: Player’s Handbook Monster Manual Dungeon Master’s Guide Errata Errata have been issued for certain fifth edition books and are available at the following location: Sage Advice & Errata. Official Rulings Official rulings on how to interpret rules are made here in the Sage Advice Compendium.
